short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring Halloween horror to Chrome with live wallpapers of eerie pumpkins, plus a search bar and quick-access icons.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bring Halloween horror to Chrome with live wallpapers of eerie pumpkins, plus a search bar and quick-access icons.

Get ready to feel the chill of Halloween with the Halloween Horror Pumpkin Live Wallpaper extension for Chrome! Each new tab opens to a haunting scene of twisted, glowing pumpkins with menacing grins, set against a dark, foggy backdrop. These high-quality live wallpapers bring the spine-tingling excitement of Halloween to life, perfect for horror enthusiasts and those who love the thrill of spooky season.

In addition to the eerie visuals, the extension includes a Google search bar for convenient browsing and quick-access icons to your favorite sites. This combination of style and function ensures you stay connected while fully embracing the spirit of Halloween horror.

Ideal for fans of horror, Halloween, and creepy aesthetics, the Halloween Horror Pumpkin Live Wallpaper extension makes each new tab feel like a walk through a haunted pumpkin patch. Immerse yourself in the frightful ambiance and let the horror pumpkins set the mood every time you browse!
